detaileddescription.para: This document contains the Software Detailed Design documentation for SysWDDiagnosis component used in project ICAS1. Intended readers of this document are all people involved in the SW project, mainly SW Architects, SW Integrators, SW Testers and SW Developers.
Describes the detailed design of the SysWDDiagnosis as defined in the SWA along with all allocated SWRs for this component.
